Trade/Device Name(s): VITEK 2 AST-Gram Positive Inducible Clindamycin Resistance
Regulation Name(s): Fully automated short-term incubation cycle antimicrobial susceptibility system
Analyte(s): Inducible Clindamycin Resistance in Staphylococcus aureus
Inducible Clindamycin Resistance in Staphylococcus lugdunensis
Inducible Clindamycin Resistance in Coagulase Negative Staphylococcus spp.
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for VITEK 2 AST-Gram Positive Inducible Clindamycin Resistance assay for detecting antimicrobial susceptibility in Staphylococcus species.
Indications for Use Summary: Laboratory aid for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Staphylococcus aureus, Staphylococcus lugdunensis, and Coagulase Negative Staphylococcus spp. using VITEK 2 and VITEK 2 Compact Systems.
